name: get_san_francisco_chronicle_news
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool news_in_bay.
Tool description: *for my personal study purposes*
An API showing all front-page news in the Bay area for the day, keyword can be customized.
eg:  https://sfnews-api.herokuapp.com/news/safe (keyword "safe")
Scrapping from San Francisco Chronicle / SFGATE / abc7News
Heroku: https://sfnews-api.herokuapp.com/
API description: Get all news titled with keyword (sources via San Francisco Chronicle )

sfchronicle.description: A keyword to filter news articles. If provided, only articles containing this keyword will be fetched. Defaults to None.
